©Pascal Kühnold
This app is developed by Pascal Kühnold.
Icons made by Pixel perfect from www.flaticon.com v0.4.7
Hey, thanks a lot for testing my App!

 The App is still in development and it could be possible that you may run into problems.

 If so, I would appreciate it if you could tell me where this problem occurred.
 Should you come across serious errors, such as the app crashing, please send me a message as well.
 Also it would be best if you can add where it happened and what you were exactly doing.

 Since the app is still under development, it is possible that larger parts of the backend side will change.
 Which may mean that the App needs to be reinstalled.

 All previously entered data will be deleted.
 Please be aware of this.

 If you have any suggestions or ideas to improve the App, please feel free to contact me.(This includes usability and appearance as well)

 Have fun testing!
 Pascal
What can you do?

 - You can create meals

 - You can edit meals

 - You can delete meals

 - You can add single ingredients to the meal

 - You can edit the ingredients by name

 - You can delete ingredients

 - The weekly planner creates meals for 7 days(You must have 7 meals in the meal list)

 - The weekly planner is also available as veggie only(just click the arrow on top where it says weekly planner)

 - You can lookup the information about a meal(just click on it in the meal list)

 - You can add ingredients or other things to the shopping list

 - You can also add all of the ingredients for a meal to the shopping list with just one click(click on notice symbol)

 - You can check the positions in the shopping list as done

 - You can also see how many positions are not checked in the shopping list


Alright Welcome to the mealplanner Don't show again Weekly planner veggie Delete List Add an item to the list einkaufsliste_background_texture Is checked in list Open Positions: %1$d Meal for multiple days Fast preparation Meal name: Ingredients: Information Show Receipt You don't have enough Veggie meals. You need at least 7 Veggie meals to create a Weekly Veggie planner
